Activity: Wake up, make some coffee and mentally prepare for the week ahead. Check personal emails and browse some game development blogs for inspiration.

Continue reviewing the codebase, focusing on modules related to player movement and camera control. Take notes on potential areas for optimization or improvement. Also watch some video tutorials about Third-person shooter games.
